Package com.jcabi.ssl.maven.plugin

SSL manipulation Maven plugin.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    KeygenMojo
    Generate SSL keystore and configure in JVM.
    Yes
    Translates word yes to different languages.

Package com.jcabi.ssl.maven.plugin Description

SSL manipulation Maven plugin.

The only dependency you need is (check our latest version available at www.jcabi.com): 

<depedency>
   <groupId>com.jcabi</groupId>
   <artifactId>jcabi-ssl-maven-plugin</artifactId>
 </dependency>

0.5
